title: RNSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Junior Executive and Apprentice Posts
description: The Rajkot Nagarik Sahakari Bank Limited (RNSB) has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 02 Junior Engineer and Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and Post-graduation can apply for the RNSB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
